name: Katella Glass & Mirror
points: Implemented AWS Cognito groups to connect AWS Lambda to AWS Simple Email Service to obfuscate API credentials
Integrated AWS Simple Email Service for customer to business messaging on website
Implemented Sass 7-1 architecture for maintainability and reusability of core components and features

name: Zphora
description: Sephora clone scaled and optimized to handle heavy traffic
points: Reduced seed data generation time  of 10 million entries by 85% using Node.js streams to reduce memory overhead and write backpressure
Built server architecture that was capable of fulfilling 10,000 requests per second with an average latency of 70ms
Integrated Redis caching and NGINX proxy + load balancing to maximize AWS EC2 performance and reduce latency by up to 77%
Utilized MongoDB sharding to increase throughput by leveraging horizontal scaling across multiple EC2 t.2 micro instances

name: fMDb
description: Microservice oriented application emulating the popular IMDb website
points: Designed and built modular views with React for integration with other application services
Automated build process using Grunt and S3 of team dependent files for immediate access
Deployed proxy server and microservices with Docker networking and AWS EC2 for modular scalability and maintainability
Configured Webpack to utilize CSS modules during React transpilation to avoid component styling conflicts across services

name: Suggestions
description: Single Page Application that helps with discovery of points of interets in a specific location
points: Integrated OAuth 2.0 with Passport.js for quicker and more secure user authentication
Built search page component that lists multiple search query results from Yelp API for easier comparison across searches
Built map component with Google Maps API for visual reference of distance from selected points of interest
